content: I think my team would greatly benefit from these tools, especially with the high-priority project we're working on at NovaTech. My top priority is to identify performance bottlenecks and optimize our API's response time, so I think I'll need a tool that provides detailed insights into transaction tracing and code-level profiling. I'll probably lean towards New Relic for this reason, but I'll definitely take a closer look at both tools and consider a trial or demo to make a final decision.
